title: Paragon Go Virtual 2015 GOTD
description:
Paragon Go Virtual 2015 GOTD

Paragon Go Virtualâ„¢ 2015 is an elegant solution that can help you accomplish the following tasks:

Transfer your live Windows to a virtual environment of Microsoft Virtual PC, VMware Workstation/Fusion, or Oracle VirtualBox 4.0 (P2V);
Create an empty virtual disk or with specific data of one of the supported virtualization vendors (Create VD);
Make Windows Vista/7 backups bootable on virtual hardware; recover the startup ability after unsuccessful virtualization with a 3rd party tool (P2V Adjust OS);
Most functionality of the product is offered through handy intuitive wizards, thatâ€™s why not only IT pros, but also inexperienced users can find it easy and efficient.

Key Features 
P2V Copy to migrate a Windows physical system to a virtual environment in the online mode.
P2V Adjust to recover the startup ability after unsuccessful virtualization with a 3rd party tool.
Create VD to create an empty virtual disk or with specific data of one of the supported virtualization vendors.
Easy size setup for virtual disks with the partition auto-resize option.
Disk file split for VMware to automatically cut the resulted virtual image to files of 2 GBs each.

Official Site: Unknown (hard to believe... but yeah...)
